net.sf.mmm.util.query.base.expression

Class ConjunctionExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.query.base.expression.ConjunctionExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression

    public class ConjunctionExpression
extends Object
implements Expression
    Implementation of Expression for logical Conjunction of a list of Expressions.

    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille
